Package by.epam.jwd.web.dao

Interface BookDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<Book>
    public interface BookDao
extends Dao<Book>
    Book Data access object interface for dao layer. Extends Dao base interface.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    "Data access object pattern"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<Book> findByAuthorName​(java.lang.String authorName)
      Finds and returns result of find book that have passed author name.
      java.util.List<Book> findByGenre​(Genre genre)
      Finds and returns result of find book that have passed Genre
      java.util.Optional<Book> findByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Finds saved book which has passed name.
      java.util.List<Book> findWhereNameLike​(java.lang.String name)
      Finds all book whose names are matches to passed name.

      • Methods inherited from interface by.epam.jwd.web.dao.Dao

        delete, findAll, findById, findPage, getPagesAmount, getRowsAmount, save, update

    • Method Detail

      • findWhereNameLike

        java.util.List<Book> findWhereNameLike​(java.lang.String name)
        Finds all book whose names are matches to passed name.
        Parameters:
        name - name of book that need to be found
        Returns:
        List of books whose names are matches with passed name.
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs

      • findByName

        java.util.Optional<Book> findByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Finds saved book which has passed name.
        Parameters:
        name - for book that need to be found
        Returns:
        Not empty optional book if there is book with passed name, empty optional book otherwise.

      • findByAuthorName

        java.util.List<Book> findByAuthorName​(java.lang.String authorName)
        Finds and returns result of find book that have passed author name.
        Parameters:
        authorName - name of author book that need to be found
        Returns:
        books that have specified author name collection
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs

      • findByGenre

        java.util.List<Book> findByGenre​(Genre genre)
        Finds and returns result of find book that have passed Genre
        Parameters:
        genre - genre of book that need to be found
        Returns:
        books that have specified genre collection
        Throws:
        DAOException - when exception in dao layer occurs
